metadata.title: joyo - Create Emotional Gift Journeys
metadata.description: Create beautiful, emotional gift experiences for proposals, announcements, surprises, and special moments.

hero.headline: Create emotional gift journeys that touch hearts
hero.subheadline: Turn your special moments into interactive stories with AI. Perfect for proposals, announcements, surprises, and celebrations.

examples.title: Inspiration for Every Occasion
examples.subtitle: Explore real examples of how people use Joyo to create unforgettable moments

romantic1.title: Anniversary Surprise
romantic1.description: A journey through 5 years of memories, ending with a weekend getaway reveal

romantic2.title: Marriage Proposal
romantic2.description: From first date to the big question, a story that led to 'yes'

family1.title: Pregnancy Announcement
family1.description: A playful way to share the news with grandparents-to-be

family2.title: New Home Reveal
family2.description: Building excitement for the family's big move

travel1.title: Surprise Trip to Paris
travel1.description: Clues and hints leading to an unforgettable destination reveal

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Create your gift journey in three simple steps

step1.title: Describe Your Gift
step1.description: Tell our AI about the occasion, recipient, and what you want to share

step2.title: Customize & Perfect
step2.description: Edit screens, add your photos, and choose the perfect theme

step3.title: Share the Magic
step3.description: Get a unique link to send to your recipient and watch them experience your gift

footer.tagline: Create emotional gift journeys that touch hearts

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start creating beautiful gift experiences today, completely free

q1.question: Is Joyo really free?
q1.answer: Yes! You can create unlimited gift journeys with all features at no cost.

q2.question: Do I need a credit card?
q2.answer: No credit card required. Simply sign up with your email and start creating.

q3.question: Can I use my own images?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Upload your own photos or choose from our integrated image library.

emptyState.title: No gifts yet
emptyState.description: Start creating your first emotional gift experience

chat.title: Create Your Gift Experience
chat.subtitle: Describe your gift and AI will create a beautiful journey for your recipient.
chat.placeholder: Describe your gift experience... Who's it for and what's the occasion?

replaceDialog.title: Replace existing text?
replaceDialog.description: You already have text in the input. Do you want to replace it with this example?

romantic1.title: Anniversary Journey
romantic1.prompt: Create a romantic journey celebrating our 5-year anniversary. Include our favorite memories, a photo slideshow, and end with a surprise weekend getaway reveal.

romantic2.title: Proposal Story
romantic2.prompt: Build a story of how we met, with choices about our first date memories, leading to a big proposal reveal with a beautiful ring photo.

romantic3.title: Love Letter Journey
romantic3.prompt: Create an emotional journey with love letters I've written, questions about our future, ending with a promise ring reveal.

family1.title: Pregnancy Announcement
family1.prompt: Make a playful journey for announcing our pregnancy to grandparents. Include baby-themed questions and reveal with an ultrasound photo.

family2.title: New Home Reveal
family2.prompt: Create an exciting journey revealing our new home to family. Include photos of house hunting, neighborhood shots, and final house reveal.

family3.title: Grandparent Gift
family3.prompt: Build a warm journey from the grandkids with photos, voice messages, and a special reveal about our upcoming visit.

travel1.title: Surprise Trip
travel1.prompt: Create a mysterious journey with travel hints and clues, leading to the big reveal of a surprise trip to Japan.

travel2.title: Birthday Adventure
travel2.prompt: Build an adventure story for a birthday surprise. Include destination clues, packing list questions, and reveal a tropical island getaway.

travel3.title: Honeymoon Reveal
travel3.prompt: Create a romantic journey revealing our honeymoon destination. Include dream location questions and beautiful destination photos.

celebration1.title: Birthday Story
celebration1.prompt: Make a fun birthday journey with memories from the past year, favorite moments, and a special gift reveal at the end.

celebration2.title: Graduation Celebration
celebration2.prompt: Build a celebratory journey for graduation with achievements, future dreams questions, and a surprise gift reveal.

celebration3.title: Retirement Journey
celebration3.prompt: Create a heartfelt journey celebrating a retirement with career highlights, memories, and a special vacation reveal.

flowEditor.clickToPreview: Click a screen to preview it
flowEditor.noScreens: No screens yet. Add your first screen to get started.

nodeList.deleteDescription: This screen will be permanently removed from your gift. This action cannot be undone.

nodeEditor.title: Edit Screen
nodeEditor.description: Make changes to this screen. Changes will be saved to your draft.

addScreen.title: Add New Screen
addScreen.description: Choose the type of screen you want to add
addScreen.descriptionWithPosition: Fill in the details for your new screen (will be inserted at position {position})
addScreen.descriptionWithoutPosition: Fill in the details for your new screen

typeDescriptions.hero: Opening screen with headline and optional image
typeDescriptions.reveal: Surprise moment with confetti and optional CTA

dialog.publishDescription: Once published, you'll get a unique link to share with your recipient.
dialog.publishTip: Preview your gift before publishing to make sure everything looks perfect!
dialog.shareDescription: Your gift is live! Share this link with your recipient.
dialog.unpublishDescription: The share link will stop working and your recipient won't be able to access it anymore. You can always publish it again later.

features.shareLink: A unique shareable link is created
features.recipientAccess: Your recipient can view the experience
features.editLater: You can still edit and update the content
features.unpublishAnytime: You can unpublish at any time

toast.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dialog.title: Choose a Theme
dialog.description: Select a theme that matches the emotional tone of your gift experience.

descriptions.playful-pastel: Light, fun, and cheerful with soft colors
descriptions.elegant-dark: Sophisticated and dramatic with dark tones
descriptions.warm-mediterranean: Warm and inviting with earthy colors

deleteConfirm.title: Delete this gift?
deleteConfirm.description: This will permanently delete your gift and all its screens. This action cannot be undone.

errors.unauthorized: You need to be signed in to do that.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Joyo, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Joyo is a platform that allows users to create and share interactive gift experiences. The service includes AI-powered flow generation, visual editing tools, media integration, and sharing capabilities.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: To use Joyo, you must create an account. You are responsible for:

responsibilities.accurate: Providing accurate and complete information during registration
responsibilities.security: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
responsibilities.unauthorized: All activities that occur under your account
responsibilities.notify: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

content.title: 4. User Content
content.ownership: You retain all rights to the content you create using Joyo. By using our service, you grant us a limited license to store, process, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the service.
content.responsibility: You are solely responsible for the content you create and share. You must ensure that your content:

prohibited.title: Does not:
prohibited.harmful: Contain harmful, threatening, or harassing material
prohibited.infringing: Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others
prohibited.spam: Contain spam, malware, or other malicious code

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.ownership: The Joyo service, including its original content, features, and functionality, is owned by Joyo and is protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.license: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the service for your personal or commercial purposes, subject to these terms.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time, with or without notice, for violating these terms or for any other reason. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Joyo is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

limitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Joyo shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by email or through the service. Your continued use of the service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Joyo ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect several types of information:

types.account: Account Information: Email address, name, and authentication credentials (when using email/password login)
types.content: Content Data: The gift experiences you create, including text, images, and configuration settings
types.usage: Usage Data: How you interact with our service, including features used and time spent
types.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use the collected information to:

purposes.service: Provide, maintain, and improve our service
purposes.communication: Send you updates, notifications, and support messages
purposes.security: Monitor and analyze usage patterns to enhance security

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:

parties.providers: Service Providers: Third-party companies that help us operate our service (Supabase, Google, Anthropic, Unsplash)
parties.legal: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
parties.business: Business Transfers: In connection with any merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and maintain your session. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our service integrates with third-party services:

services.supabase: Supabase: Database and authentication (see Supabase Privacy Policy)
services.google: Google OAuth: Authentication service (see Google Privacy Policy)
services.anthropic: Anthropic Claude: AI content generation (see Anthropic Privacy Policy)
services.unsplash: Unsplash: Image search and integration (see Unsplash Privacy Policy)

rights.access: Access the personal information we hold about you
rights.deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
rights.portability: Export your content in a portable format

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. If you delete your account, we will delete your personal information within 30 days, except where we are required to retain it for legal purposes.

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or through the service. Your continued use after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
